It's a pain in the ass, but there is a way to bypass Cinavia.  Basically, you play the movie until it pops up, then go to "date/time settings" and move the clock ahead one hour.  The movie will then play for another 20 mins before another Cinavia warning.  Repeat ad nauseum.  Or just watch it on your pc.

Don't watch it on PS3 guys.  That stuff is for gaming and it's such a unreliable machine.  You will break that machine if you keep over using it.  

Cinavia can kiss my ass and just get a laptop with HDMI output under 400 bucks nowadays.
This has my vote for worst movie of 2011!

So im new to this torrent downloading and for some reason if i try to dl anything more than like 2 or 3 gb utorrent say its at its filesize limit and wont finish with the torrent i downloaded anyone have a answer for me???? or if im doing something wrong??

Im new to this torrent/movie downloading and for some reason when i try to use utorrent with any torrent thats bigger than like 2-3 gbs it says that its at its filesize limit what can i do about this? please help

People, just get yourself a copy of the latest ipfilter (if your using utorrent) and copy it here:
C:\Documents and Settings\[userid]\Application Data\uTorrent\ipfilter.dat
No need to pay for anything.
I forgot, in utorrent you also need to set ipfilter.enable to "true" in the advanced settings. If you don't have it there then add it.
